ContentDesc_Bockmanns Gefolge:
Bockman, a wandering revenant trapped in the corporeal realm, has reclaimed his legendary suit of armor and now waits silently near the Tamâ€“Tara Deepcroft for any who would challenge him. Not only does the undead knight brandish a massive blade capable of incapacitating multiple victims in one fell stroke, but when threatened, Bockman will summon his decaying minions from the pits of the seventh hell.



Defeat the restless soul, and send him back to the Lifestream where he may, at long last, find peace.
